text: Tomara taderake tadera pitrparicaye daka. Eta'i allahara kache n'yayasangata. Yadi tomara tadera pitr-paricaya na jana, tabe tara tomadera dharmiya bha'i o bandhurupe ganya habe. E byapare tomadera kona bicyuti hale tate tomadera kona gonaha ne'i, tabe icchakrta hale bhinna katha. Allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.
